lines.text: If you're good, good things will happen to you.

[sarcastic]
Where'd you learn that, the workhouse?
What happens if you get caught?
He was transported to one of the finest institutions for higher learning in the country.
What's to happen to the likes of me? Just trying to make a dishonest living for himself.
And you Dodger, you're my friend.
Huh! A friend's just an enemy in disguise. You can't trust nobody.
We like our peace and quiet here.
[kicks open the door and storms in]
No need to knock so courteously Bill; you're among friends here.
Dodger, it's not a game anymore.

[sadly]
It never was a game, mate. You just thought it was.
